targets.query:
from(bucket: "proxmox")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "avail" or r._field == "used")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] == "pve")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
    _time: r._time,
    _measurement: r.measurement,
    _field: "used_perc",
    _value: float(v: 100) / (float(v: r.avail) + float(v: r.used)) * float(v:r.used)
     }))
  |> drop(columns: ["avail","used"])

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together

targets.expr: (sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="pve.trox.lan:9100",job="node_exporter", mode!="idle"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="pve.trox.lan:9100",job="node_exporter"}[$__rate_interval])))) * 100

panels.title: CPU Busy

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together (15 min average)
panels.title: Sys Load (15m avg)

targets.query:
import "regexp"

from(bucket: "home_assistant")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "%")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "sensor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "brother_hl_3170cdw_series_black_toner_cartridge" or r["entity_id"] == "brother_hl_3170cdw_series_cyan_toner_cartridge" or r["entity_id"] == "brother_hl_3170cdw_series_magenta_toner_cartridge" or r["entity_id"] == "brother_hl_3170cdw_series_yellow_toner_cartridge")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["friendly_name"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "entity_id", "_field", "domain", "source"])
  |> rename(fn: (column) => regexp.replaceAllString(r: /.*(Black|Cyan|Magenta|Yellow).*/, v: column, t: "$1"))

tags.value: Brother HL-3170CDW series Black Toner Cartridge
Brother HL-3170CDW series Cyan Toner Cartridge
Brother HL-3170CDW series Magenta Toner Cartridge
Brother HL-3170CDW series Yellow Toner Cartridge
